name: Veet Wax Strips Dry Skin
description: A salon smooth finish at home which lasts for 28 days through just three simple steps; peel, apply and pull. 20 Pre-coated Wax Strips & two perfect finishing wipes are available in one pack. The strips are specially formulated with Aloe Vera, known for its moisturizing properties *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
